ARABIC: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: by which heaven will be split apart? His promise will be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The heavens itself will be rent asunder (on that day). His promise is bound to be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the Day whose severity shall cause the heaven to split asunder? Allah's promise is ever bound to be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day, the heavens will be rent asunder. This is the decree of God which has already been ordained.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The heaven will split asunder with its grief; the promise of Allah will surely occur.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Whereon the heaven will be cleft asunder His promise is certainly to be accomplished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The heaven shall rend asunder thereby; His promise is ever brought to fulfillment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Whereby heaven shall be split, and its promise shall be performed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The very heaven being then rent asunder. His promise is to be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Day when the heavens will be rent asunder and God's promise shall be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the heaven shall be split there in. His promise needs must be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and wherein the sky will be rent apart? His promise is bound to be fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder? His Promise needs must be accomplished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Whereon the heaven will be cleft asunder? His Promise is certainly to be accomplished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: on which the heaven will split apart, and His promise is done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The heaven will shatter thereby. His promise is always fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:18] with the heaven being rent asunder thereon, on that Day, because of its severity. His promise, exalted be He, of the coming of that [Day], shall be fulfilled, that is to say, it will come to pass without doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The very heaven being then) when the children turn grey; and it is said: due to the descent of the 704 command of the Lord and the angels (rent asunder. His promise) regarding the resurrection (is to be fulfilled) is to take place.
